name: Crane.tv
tag_list: art, design, travel, lifestyle, contemporary-culture, culture, fashion, international, style, graphic, craft, arts-and-crafts, music
overview:
Crane.tv is the premium online video magazine for contemporary culture. Devised by an experienced editorial team, its content is aimed at a digital audience of style conscious and culturally curious, global citizens. To date, Crane.tv offers a selection of 700+ videos, showcasing the latest and the best on its five magazine channels - Art, Design, Fashion, Lifestyle and Travel.

An international editorial team of leading video-makers and lifestyle-scouts produces the high-calibre content, featuring new talents as well as established icons, celebrated in their field. Taking a decidedly different perspective is at the journalistic heart of the Crane.tv philosophy. A vibrant online platform and an influential voice, Crane.tv aims to convince with credibility and cool alike. Seeking to connect with their interactive audience of the creatively minded, a selection of top quality talent-generated content is chosen for the website on a regular basis. Reaching millions of unique monthly visitors through several partner sites, Crane.tv is fast becoming the leader of online video culture. Crane.tvâ€™s content is watched in 70 countries around the globe, providing digital entertainment at its best: constantly up-dated, fast, fluid, challenging and always evolving. Crane.tv selects only the most inspiring developments of urban lifestyle, the edgiest young talents and the most provocative thinkers.

Apart from enjoying the high-quality videos, Crane.tvâ€™s online audience can sign up for weekly newsletters, create play-lists of their favourite videos, and nominate ideas for future content. Other additional features are: weekly up-dated youtube presence, facebook page, twitter posts and blog. We also have a Crane.tv Nokia app which is available from the OVI store.

milestones.description: If content is the new king, is Getty signing Crane.tv the new deal?

milestones.description: Introducing the Calgary Bag an exciting collaboration between Bill Amberg, the Business of Fashion and Crane.tv.
